named-query.name: ReportingInfoEntity.findAllOrderByReportId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM ReportingInfoEntity a ORDER BY a.reportScheduleId

named-query.name: ReportingInfoEntity.findByCalendarId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM ReportingInfoEntity a WHERE a.calendarId = :calendarId

named-query.name: ReportingInfoEntity.findByFacilityId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM ReportingInfoEntity a WHERE a.facilityId = :facilityId

named-query.name: TemplateSetInfoEntity.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM TemplateSetInfoEntity a ORDER BY a.templateSetId

named-query.name: TemplateSetInfoEntity.findByOwnerRoleId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM TemplateSetInfoEntity a WHERE a.ownerRoleId = :ownerRoleId ORDER BY a.templateSetId

named-query.name: TemplateSetDetailInfoEntity.findByTemplateSetId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM TemplateSetDetailInfoEntity a WHERE a.id.templateSetId = :templateSetId ORDER BY a.id.orderNo
